title: [Large-scale] Technology-Enhanced Inquiry-Based Language Learning Design

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital device proficiency and intermediate or higher language proficiency
context.additional_context: BYOD-enabled collaborative environment emphasizing social interaction

learning_goals: Learners can establish design and implementation plans for language projects using technological tools.
Learners can apply metacognitive strategies in the process of solving real-world language problems through inquiry-based activities.

Learners will exchange ≥2 rounds of feedback on language expression with 3 peers using digital platforms (Google Docs, Padlet, etc.) over one week and submit a final assignment meeting ≥3 of 5 feedback incorporation criteria.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
